name: Dark Dragonite

abilities.name: Summon Minions
abilities.text: When you play Dark Dragonite from your hand, search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pok√©mon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Giant Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: Sometimes called "The God of Destruction." Its wings are able to support it in spite of its massive weight.

strengths: Summon Minions provides incredible bench setup when evolved
No weakness makes it harder to exploit
Colorless typing means any energy works
weaknesses: Giant Tail is coin flip dependent - 50% chance to do nothing
70 HP is very low for a Stage 2

competitiveHistory: Dark Dragonite's Summon Minions Pokemon Power made it valuable in decks that needed fast bench setup. This non-holo version is functionally identical to the holo version.

rulings.ruling: Summon Minions only triggers when Dark Dragonite is played from your hand to evolve a Pokemon.
You may search for 0, 1, or 2 Basic Pokemon with Summon Minions.
Giant Tail does no damage on tails.
